column3: This mild-mannered Mol needs the aid of a warrior.
Survey the designated location and slay any beasts that appear.
You there! You look like you have slain a beast or two.
I was told today by the udgan that the gods want me to slay a beast by the Dusk Throne.
However, I have never even killed an insect. And I am certainly far too weak to take on any of the creatures that dwell near the Dusk Throne. Oh, why did the gods ask this of me?
Could you slay the creature in my stead? The udgan did not specify that the beast need be slain by my hand.
Please, go to the Dusk Throne and slay any beasts you find. You are my only hope!
Please, go to the Dusk Throne and slay any beasts you find.
Tell me, what did you face?
Ha ha, now I see why the gods gave me this task!
I have been working on a set of armor ordered by a Budugan warrior for a few days now. However, no matter how hard I tried, I could not think of an appropriate design.
But hearing you slayed an anala has made up my mind. I shall give the armor a fiery design! That should suit a brave warrior like him nicely.
Thank you for all of your help. Do not hesitate to let me know in the future if you have a problem of your own! Perhaps the gods will be able to guide you too.
